page.title: 10Traditional Events.
page.content: This May some local people tried to play Cnapan for the first time for many many years.Some say this was the beginning of Rugby football and it was played between Newport and Nevern. But there are some events that have carried on almost without break for many many years. Ffair Gurig is celebrated every last week in June,we have our School Sports that Wednesday,there are many other events but the main attraction is the street fair with numerous stalls along Long St. We hav a Regetta,a Carnival,and I've been smacked on Bedd Morys stone on the Beating of the Bounds. Our Mayor is the only mayor in Britain that is made the same time as the Mayor of London in November.There is also the Plygain,a Welsh service at 6a.m.Christmas Day which is different.
